website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are looking for a product to keep your car shining in between waxing or don't like to spend a lot of time using traditional waxes, this is an affordable 2-in-1 wash and wax by a top name in the industry.
pros: Saves time detailing your car, as it's a wash and wax in one handy formula
Produces an impressive shine for half the work and price of other waxes
cons: Won't protect or shine as long as pricier waxes
Doesn't "suds up" as well as regular car washes

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but don't pay too much as price varies wildly.
customer_reviews.text: Thick potion = a little goes a long way. Price seems to vary wildly on amazon. Got my bottle for $6.99. Have seen it listed for up to $12.99.
customer_reviews.author: agent5-0

customer_reviews.title: this shampoo is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This wash and wax shampoo is the best I've ever used. I'm a weekend warrior mobile detailer, and I've tried many different kinds. With this one, you can see the wax-- and the solution SITS UP on the paint. It leaves a beautiful finish of carnuba that melt into your paint-- and leaves behind minimal streaking. This commonly found big box store soap outperforms other brands that make fancy youtube videos (Ch_m_cal G_ys), by a country mile. I need a sponsorship from the makers of this product. I refuse to use anything in its stead. Outstanding job, Mother's
customer_reviews.author: AlBundy

customer_reviews.title: Leaves more water spots and not too sudsy...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this since I am familiar with the Mothers wash and wax product line- I use the Mothers fiberglass wash and wax for my boat. This product does leave more water stains and it is not as sudsy as the Meguiar's G17748 Wash and Wax. It actually is not a bad product, just not a great wash and wax. The reason why I tried it was because my product that I normally use (Meguiar's G17748 Wash and Wax - 48 oz.) doubled in price here on Amazon with the shipping cost. So after trying this product I just Googled the Meguiar's and found it for 8.39 online at the Wal_ _ _ _ store.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A good carwash soap that is environmentally friendly.
customer_reviews.text: A good carwash soap that is environmentally friendly at a reasonable price point, which is hard to find. The street drain close to my driveway drains directly into the James River watershed, so that is important to me. Seems to clean as well as any and has a nice smell to it!
customer_reviews.author: Doctyphoon

customer_reviews.title: Suds up very nicely and provides tons of lubrication
customer_reviews.text: Suds up very nicely and provides tons of lubrication. Compared to the Turtle Wax Ice Premium car wash, the suds lasted longer, and provided better lubrication. I also really like the added protection and scratch filling properties of the carnauba wax that is added to the formula. Overall a very good car wash for the price. Just make sure you use it liberally or else you wont see the magic. The directions on the back of the bottle are too conservative of ratios in my opinion, so you might wanna add some extra for good measure and use a powerful stream to create the suds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good car wash for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent car wash but if you really want the benefits of a wax you still need to wax. That said though I have no complaints and the car drys well after cleaning with this. It also arrived with no issues and was packed decently. Given the price of it I think the results are pretty good. There are more expensive washes I'm just not sure they are worth the difference. I got this to use on a 2017 Spider 124 and I may stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: DEC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my truck lookin new!
customer_reviews.text: Man this is amazing I usually wash my truck once a week, but with this it keeps the shine even longer! Since I live in California the sun is always out and this wash helps protect the clear coat looking brand new after every wash!
customer_reviews.author: Quinton Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for in between annual waxes
customer_reviews.text: Actually worked! I typically like to do a real 3 step wax on my vehicles but between my 25 foot boat, extended cab pickup and a handful of other toys, it just was not feasible. This product is a great (though I’m sure not perfect) substitute for a hand wax. I still plan to wax once a year, but the way the water beads 2-3 weeks after use (see pictures), parked outside gives me a lot of reassurance.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: What a slippery and bright shine, the car looks perpetually wet....... amazing foam... no need for a foam gun... goodbye Griots and hello Mother's California Gold Carnauba wash and wax....
customer_reviews.author: Sally Daley

customer_reviews.title: The best car wash solution I've used BAR NONE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've detailed a shoot-load of cars and THIS IS MY FAVORITE!!!! There's a nice amount of wax which gives the car's shine an extra pop. This is my #1 goto. I've used stuff by Chemical Bros, Griots and maybe something by Phil? Can't remember that last one. ANyhoose I just ordered another bottle. You get a lot fo da $$$ Good value and it works Mui Bueno!!
customer_reviews.author: will potter

customer_reviews.title: Used with pressure washer bottle clean and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I use a pressure washer on my car and wanted some clean shine product. Instruction say to dilute but my pressure washer came with washer spray applicator. On first two uses monitored the consumption and found it to be in line with recommendations. ( hint: i do not hand dry! I use a leaf blower. Fast)
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Bolger

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Lathers nicely and cleans well but you have to buff with soft cloth after it dries. I didn’t and everything was streaky and had residue. Wipe with dry cloth after vehicle dries.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Vet

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Car Shiny
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bottle of Mothers California Gold Carnauba Wash and Wax I've purchased. It foams up easily in water to achieve a great washed car look. It helps to keep the car looking shiny between waxes. I think it helps keep traditional wax working longer but it doesn't replace waxing for me.
customer_reviews.author: rat

customer_reviews.title: Great product.. works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: Great product.. works wonderfully. As you dad may have told you buy junk get junk. Or was it penny wise pound foolish.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Bondurant

customer_reviews.title: So impressed ! I have a black car...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. At first I didn’t like it since would not Foam as much as regular soap. But, once I applied, removed, and dried. It was like magic! No streaks, and above all my black exterior was shining like if hand wax was applied. Not only did it save me time, it saves me money! I no longer hand wax my car after drying it :)
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very good suds and makes my truck look brilliant awesome better the meguiars that's for sure will continue to use it a few more times on other cars will update after a few car washes and a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better bottle
customer_reviews.text: Can't really add to the other reviews much - it cleans well, protects for a while between washes and suds up pretty well. The only negative is the bottle. It's relatively soft plastic and it's shape result in you getting it all ovee the place when the bottle's relatively full. Take the lid off, pick it up and it squashes and overflows.. Wish it came in a more sturdy bottle with a side handle like the other Mothers soap has. Still, for the price you can lose some and it's still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a car wash and Wax GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Does a car wash and Wax GOOD! I never really have time to do a regular wax on my vehicles. Mothers 05674 California Gold Carnauba Wash & Wax takes care of both and puts a nice clean shiny finish on your car that last.
customer_reviews.author: Ferm

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my rig clean and shiny. Works better than the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Not many suds-disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have to put a lot of soap in the water to get suds, was dissatisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.  ( Largo, Florida )

customer_reviews.title: Shiny Town
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Expensive compared to your avg car wash solution Minimal suds Need to use more per wash Pros: Best shine from any car wash I've used The wax works Will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDude

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for a long time on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a long time on my vehicles. The shine and protection that it leaves on the vehicles meets my expectation. I haven't felt the need to try another product. The Gold Carnauba Wash and Wax was the first Mothers product that I had ever used. I was so impressed that I have now expanded their line and use of products. It's obvious that the company takes pride in what they do.
customer_reviews.author: dieselenthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Good carwash with cheater wax
customer_reviews.text: Have been a customer of this product for many years. You get many years from one bottle; unless you wash your vehicle every week. The shine and protection will last for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brezenski

customer_reviews.title: No Shine
customer_reviews.text: I bought Mothers California Gold Carnauba Wash & Wax. It smells good and washes the dirt away. I was disappointed in the amount of wax was left on the car's surface. Hardly any beading. So, I went to the car wash instead. What a big difference. I will now buy some carnauba wax and wax it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: No forming action at all it just doesn’t seem to cut anything would even take one day old brake dust off the wheels not good for the dollar never buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Gerry L.

customer_reviews.title: Beat expectations
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect, but have been using on my truck for a couple months and the stuff is great. Its the next best thing to hand waxing, which I expect to to (just less often).
customer_reviews.author: NorCal John

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WASH/ WAX!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME!!! Wash your car, and it is like you gave it a wax job at the same time! Water just falls off in sheets, never seen anything like it! HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES J GLENNAN

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Wash & Wax
customer_reviews.text: Mothers California Gold Carnauba Wash & Wax keeps my car beading in the rain. It's perfect for the paint as well since I have only used this car wash. I received it on time But it was not packaged well. Bottles is bent and dented and they are plastic. The top is pushed down from being packaged incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I WAXED it!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my BLACK truck looking like I spent an extra hour or two waxing it! Works great, good foam...did I say GREAT shine and water beading? Unsure how long it lasts but I wash every week or two and it looks GREAT! Also helps to shed dirt.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: It actually does what it says as opposed to another brand I purchased in a blue bottle with gold flakes. That was garbage. This has saved me from waxing my new SUV as often. I'm heading out to use it right now
customer_reviews.author: Tony C.

customer_reviews.title: Good car wash
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Use to wash your vehicles, if you’re using Turtle wax Seal & Shine. You will not be disappointed. Will not strip off wax.
customer_reviews.author: phillip ludd

customer_reviews.title: Great car wash.
customer_reviews.text: I love this car wash. It give the car a nice deep shine in between waxes. I tend to put more than the recommended amount in so that I have plenty of suds for my vehicles and they always turn out nice. Does a pretty good job of reducing water spots that I have had with other soaps. I use it one a dark brown car and a silver van.
customer_reviews.author: Damage Inc XLE

customer_reviews.title: by far the best car soap on the market
customer_reviews.text: the sad part is we are no longer able to find it in the store but amazon has it! This is the all around best car wash we have found as far as cleaning, shine and keeping its foaming ability. a little goes a long way. love it
customer_reviews.author: sheila b

customer_reviews.title: Works good, store on something durable
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only negative is be careful where you store it. Our bottle leaked around the cap (possibly from high heat) and the shampoo damaged the wood shelf it was sitting on.
customer_reviews.author: musicfan

customer_reviews.title: Where are the suds?
customer_reviews.text: Not enough suds even after using a paint mixer paddle attached to a drill. Will go back to using Meguiar's
customer_reviews.author: Makinpar

customer_reviews.title: Mother truster
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps the paint protected in my gulf coast sun. Have used for years-no complaints. I trust Mothers
customer_reviews.author: LA in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: My favorite car wash
customer_reviews.text: My favorite car wash. Very good scent and protects wax on your car without stripping it with harsh cleaners. If you are looking for a wash to use frequently after a good wax job, this is what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this stuff. He said it gets the dirt and brake dust off his car without effort. He loves the wax shine on his car when done.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Q

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: You only need small amount to leave your car nice and clean with a minor amount of added wax protection.
customer_reviews.author: EndoT800

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats Mothers car cleaning products!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stuff on the market, makes the car shine for days and all you need to do is add water and wash your car and it looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Best carwash liquid out there been using this for years and my car still looks new because of it.
customer_reviews.author: K O

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Not an expert on car washes, but after reading pro it reviews, went with this one. I was very satisfied. It cleaned my car well (including the bird poop) and left it shiny. Plus, it has a lot of product. It had been two weeks and my car still looks very good, even better than the car wash since I did it by hand. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Mild, convenient and makes my car look like a million dollars. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy777

customer_reviews.title: Amazing soap and wax combo
customer_reviews.text: This soap and wax works beautifully and really beads the water off.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: i use this as a lube on my sawmill blade. it keeps the blade cool and waxes it so it dont rust when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Lots of wax spots on glass
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be great for my cars new paint job but I had spots all over the glass and lights? I had to scrub with alcohol to get it off. Does a nice job waxing but adds work to car wash.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased Mothers products for my car needs, very good product
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Never wax your car again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Keeps truck looking like new No need to send to détailler anymore Should name it liquid shine !
customer_reviews.author: M Hervieux

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Washes and wakes as it says it does.. Easy-to-use use.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love this car wash. The only downside is you have to use quite a bit so its kind of pricey. This does not replace a good wax on a vehicle but it helps keep the car protected between waxes. Water beads really well.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing, you barely need any to wash your car ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my car for almost a year now. It smells amazing, you barely need any to wash your car so it lasts forever. I will be buying again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is all I have used on my 2015 ML 350, and it is always shining. Couldn't be happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Bondi

customer_reviews.title: Car wash solution.
customer_reviews.text: Real easy don’t have to use a lot and it really smells good. Works and real sudsy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron N.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job cleaning the paint and making it look great
customer_reviews.text: Goes on with a lot of suds, Does a great job cleaning the paint and making it look
customer_reviews.author: kwb75

customer_reviews.title: Super Clean & Shinny
customer_reviews.text: Super clean and shinny! Suds up good and rinses off easy... Water beads off like a fresh wax...
customer_reviews.author: SWfan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Lots of foam and does not leave any water marks.
customer_reviews.author: MJvR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty foaming and cleaning power leaves your car clean and spotless
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality car wash soap
customer_reviews.text: You have to use three times the recommended amount to wash your car.
customer_reviews.author: Don B

customer_reviews.title: Be Carefull Not To Use Too Much
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time this week and I think I used too much because I had some difficulty rinsing the residue from my car. It is January and the temperature was below 50 so this may have been a factor - not sure. Other than that it seems to both clean the car well and there is wax in the mix which can be seen when drying the car with a microfiber cloth.
customer_reviews.author: jaldeborgh

customer_reviews.title: Great product... I'm on my 3rd bottle. I won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I use about 4-5oz in my foam canon canister then fill the rest with water I get a great lather.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my SUV looks like it just got a good wax job.
customer_reviews.author: GG Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing car wash/wax that i've ever used in 32 years!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a car wash product that didn't leave my car with tons of leftover soap spots, especially on the windows. Mothers delivered. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: charles c.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We all know Mother's is the best, and nothing but the best for my Corvette!
customer_reviews.author: Romer

customer_reviews.title: Mothers car wash
customer_reviews.text: It’s mother’s car wash..... what more could you ask for? Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hook

customer_reviews.title: Love love absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and you can actually feel the wax and see the difference after washing.
customer_reviews.author: camille

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent car wash!!! For me it works best when used in a foamer
customer_reviews.author: Always Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very sudsy
customer_reviews.text: The wash is great for the price and creates lots of suds. Perfect for a foam washer.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Good but the one without the wax in the mix is better
customer_reviews.author: E. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Stick with Meguiars
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Meguiars wash and wax Decided to give Mothers a try It leaves a decent shine but Very poor foaming ability.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It is better than Blackmagic car shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product helped to remove most of the sun baked grime on my vehicles paint.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: The only car soap I use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this car soap for a while now its great,
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a real fan
customer_reviews.text: Normally I do like Mothers products but this soap did not foam up like products I have used
customer_reviews.author: John Dunten

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great value, use in my car wash unit. Leaves no film!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stuff is amazing and smells good enough to eat! But don't eat it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, alongside Meguiar's products, the best...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best car washes I have ever used, along with the Meguiar's, awesome product. Old Sequoia looks nice. The smell is also very pleasant.

customer_reviews.title: Great car wash
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. No other car wash makes the water bead so much!!

customer_reviews.title: May Need a Bit More Product in Your Wash Water than Instructions Say
customer_reviews.text: Washes well and leaves and brilliant shine on your car. Good value!

customer_reviews.title: Great value and end product
customer_reviews.text: Good product,. A little goes a long way. Great value and result.

customer_reviews.title: No Soap Suds.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to lather and make suds as well as Mcguires. Won't buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as expected. I think Rainx is a better product in both dirt removal, protection and lasting

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Leaves a nice shine.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good and the wax built into the wash leaves a nice protective shine. I like this better than the Meguiars.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Suuuuds
customer_reviews.text: I got a really good deal a few weeks back on 3 bottles. Washing two cars each week it goes fast but I have been happy. I have a black car and paint still looks good. I do use Meguiar's Ultimate Quik Wax after each wash to maximize show car look.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves awful water spots
customer_reviews.text: Did not like left many water spots no matter what I did

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Thanks ! Great product!! Would love if you sent me a promo code for a future purchase ;)

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shine
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this soap smells and always makes my car look like I went to the car wash.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for any detailer
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I've been in the detail business over 20yrs and this is 1 of the best soaps I've ever used, very happy with this product...

customer_reviews.title: can't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have to use a ton to keep the suds up. Much prefer Meguiar's gold class

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, work fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, works so well. Can't beat this stuff for quality.

customer_reviews.text: I have washed my own cars for the past 30 years. I have tried many different car wash products over the years. This is definitely the best I have used and I don't plan to try anything else.

customer_reviews.title: Best wash on the market!

customer_reviews.title: Great value - so much better than buying it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value - so much better than buying it in the store! And I love this car wash. Have been using it on my car for the two years I've had it and my paint still looks like it did when the car was brand new.

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and
customer_reviews.text: Don’t dilute....I use it as it is and plenty of foam and shine after rinse

customer_reviews.title: Best wash and wax or the money
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous wash and wax products over the years with decent results. When I finally tried the Mothers Gold, I never looked back. It's the only carwash product I buy for at home use.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is a car wash and wax.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Repeat buyer of this item and many other Mothers products.

product_meta.title: Mothers 05674 California Gold Carnauba Wash & Wax, 64 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:64 oz.Mothers California Gold Carnauba Wash and Wax - 64 ounce is the quick and easy way to clean, shine and protect your paint. Used between regular waxing, Carnauba wash and wax easily dissolves and removes stubborn road grime and dirt, all while boosting your existing wax. It helps in giving that "just waxed" look and feel. It is powerful, super-sudsy, bio-degradable and pH balanced. This wash and wax has it all, making it the perfect addition to a well-maintained finish. This formula allows for a quick rinse, and the results are a spot-free brilliantly shining finish.
feature_bullets: Mothers Carnauba Wash and Wax is the quick and easy way to clean, shine and protect your paint
Easily dissolves and removes stubborn road grime and dirt, all while boosting your existing wax
Powerful, ultra-sudsy, biodegradable and pH balanced
You'll be left with a spot-free shining finish

specifications.Cover Included: Mothers 05674 California Gold Carnauba Wash & Wax - 64 oz.
